course_title: Contextual Education Ia for Teaching Parish Hybrid Cohort
class_notes: (advanced permissions from Dr. Tom Elliott required; (concurrent enrollment in LA 503 required for any student who entered the MDiv program prior to Fall 2023)  (All students in Con Ed I will be required to complete additional learning modules during the course of the semester) (Students must be available Monday 9:00am-1:00pm; meeting times vary by group)
course_description: First-year MDiv students who are in the Teaching Parish Program may enroll for CE551TPa,b (residential) or CE551TPHa/b (hybrid) in lieu of CE551a,b. Participants are assigned to student pastor groups in respective geographic areas or online cohort groups. Coursework is experiential and collegial in nature, with teaching parish participants engaging in practice and reflection on a variety of ministerial activities (e.g., preaching, systems analysis, planning, and teaching).
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6001, Section #: 10, Type: PRA, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: M 9a-1p, Instructor: T. Elliott, Status: Closed
